newPatientsHbb.query: SELECT COUNT(uuid) as "total", DAYNAME(registration_date) as period FROM patient WHERE registration_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND registration_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND renewal = 0 AND project_id = 1 GROUP BY period;

newPatientsPax.query: SELECT COUNT(uuid) as "total", DAYNAME(registration_date) as period FROM patient WHERE registration_date >= {{ this.date.from }}AND registration_date <= {{ this.date.to }}AND renewal = 0 AND project_id = 2 GROUP BY period;

returningPatientsHbb.query: SELECT COUNT(uuid) as "total", DAYNAME(registration_date) as period FROM patient WHERE registration_date >= {{ this.date.from }}AND registration_date <= {{ this.date.to }}AND renewal = 1 AND project_id = 1 GROUP BY period;

returningPatientsPax.query: SELECT COUNT(uuid) as "total", DAYNAME(registration_date) as period FROM patient WHERE registration_date >= {{ this.date.from }}AND registration_date <= {{ this.date.to }}AND renewal = 1 AND project_id = 2 GROUP BY period;

imaSubsidyTotal.query: SELECT SUM(t.debit_equiv - t.credit_equiv) as "total", DAYNAME(trans_date) as period FROM (SELECT p.debit_equiv, p.credit_equiv, p.trans_date FROM posting_journal as p WHERE p.account_id = 3551 AND trans_date = {{ this.date.from }} UNION ALL SELECT g.debit_equiv, g.credit_equiv, g.trans_date FROM general_ledger as g WHERE g.account_id = 3551 AND trans_date={{ this.date.from }}) as t GROUP BY period;

imaSubsidyPatients.query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT debitor_uuid) as "total", DAYNAME(sale.invoice_date) as period FROM sale JOIN sale_subsidy JOIN subsidy JOIN debitor_group WHERE sale.uuid = sale_subsidy.sale_uuid AND sale_subsidy.subsidy_uuid = subsidy.uuid AND subsidy.debitor_group_uuid = debitor_group.uuid AND sale.project_id = 1 AND sale.invoice_date = {{ this.date.from }}AND  debitor_group.uuid = "25ba37de-3b26-4624-afba-f2ec002da9b8" AND sale.uuid NOT IN (SELECT sale_uuid FROM credit_note) GROUP BY period;

newFicheSalesHbb.query: SELECT COUNT(sale.uuid) as "total", DAYNAME(sale.invoice_date) as period FROM sale join sale_item where sale_item.sale_uuid = sale.uuid AND sale_item.inventory_uuid = (SELECT uuid from inventory where code = 020002) AND sale.invoice_date = {{ this.date.from }} AND sale.project_id = 1 AND sale.uuid NOT IN (SELECT sale_uuid FROM credit_note) GROUP BY period;

newFicheSalesPax.query: SELECT COUNT(sale.uuid) as "total", DAYNAME(sale.invoice_date) as period FROM sale join sale_item where sale_item.sale_uuid = sale.uuid AND sale_item.inventory_uuid = (SELECT uuid from inventory where code = 020002) AND sale.invoice_date = {{ this.date.from }} AND sale.project_id = 2 AND sale.uuid NOT IN (SELECT sale_uuid FROM credit_note) GROUP BY period;

oldFicheSalesHbb.query: SELECT COUNT(sale.uuid) as "total", DAYNAME(sale.invoice_date) as period FROM sale join sale_item where sale_item.sale_uuid = sale.uuid AND sale_item.inventory_uuid = (SELECT uuid from inventory where code = 020003) AND sale.invoice_date = {{ this.date.from }}AND sale.project_id = 1 AND sale.uuid NOT IN (SELECT sale_uuid FROM credit_note) GROUP BY period;

oldFicheSalesPax.query: SELECT COUNT(sale.uuid) as "total", DAYNAME(sale.invoice_date) as period FROM sale join sale_item where sale_item.sale_uuid = sale.uuid AND sale_item.inventory_uuid = (SELECT uuid from inventory where code = 020003) AND sale.invoice_date = {{ this.date.from }}AND sale.project_id = 2 AND sale.uuid NOT IN (SELECT sale_uuid FROM credit_note) GROUP BY period;

totalSalesHbb.query: SELECT COUNT(uuid) as "total", DAYNAME(invoice_date) as period FROM sale WHERE invoice_date = {{ this.date.from }}AND sale.project_id = 1 AND sale.uuid NOT IN (SELECT sale_uuid FROM credit_note) GROUP BY period;

totalSalesPax.query: SELECT COUNT(uuid) as "total", DAYNAME(invoice_date) as period FROM sale WHERE invoice_date = {{ this.date.from }}AND sale.project_id = 2 AND sale.uuid NOT IN (SELECT sale_uuid FROM credit_note) GROUP BY period;

principalCashExpenseHbb.query: SELECT SUM(if(currency_id=1, credit_equiv / 930, credit_equiv)) as "total", DAYNAME(trans_date) as period FROM (SELECT p.debit_equiv, p.credit_equiv, p.currency_id, p.trans_date FROM posting_journal as p WHERE p.account_id IN (2935, 2939) AND p.trans_date = {{ this.date.from }} UNION ALL SELECT g.debit_equiv, g.credit_equiv, g.currency_id, g.trans_date FROM general_ledger as g WHERE g.account_id IN (2935, 2939) AND g.trans_date = {{ this.date.from }}) as t GROUP BY period;

principalCashIncomeHbb.query: SELECT SUM(if(currency_id=1,debit_equiv / 930, debit_equiv)) as "total", DAYNAME(trans_date) as period FROM (SELECT p.debit_equiv, p.credit_equiv, p.currency_id, p.trans_date FROM posting_journal as p WHERE p.account_id IN (2935, 2939) AND p.trans_date = {{ this.date.from }} UNION ALL SELECT g.debit_equiv, g.credit_equiv, g.currency_id, g.trans_date FROM general_ledger as g WHERE g.account_id IN (2935, 2939) AND g.trans_date = {{ this.date.from }}) as t GROUP BY period;

auxCashHbb.query: SELECT SUM(if(currency_id = 2, cost * 930, cost )) as "total", DAYNAME(date) as period FROM cash WHERE  project_id = 1 AND date>={{ this.date.from }} AND date<={{ this.date.to }} AND uuid NOT IN (SELECT cash_uuid FROM cash_discard) GROUP BY period;

auxCashPax.query: SELECT SUM(if(currency_id = 2, cost * 930, cost )) as "total", DAYNAME(date) as period FROM cash WHERE  project_id = 2 AND date>={{ this.date.from }} AND date<={{ this.date.to }} AND uuid NOT IN (SELECT cash_uuid FROM cash_discard) GROUP BY period;

auxCashTotalInvoiceHbb.query: SELECT COUNT(invoice_uuid) as "total", DAYNAME(date) as period FROM cash join cash_item where cash_item.cash_uuid = cash.uuid AND date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND project_id = 1 GROUP BY period;

auxCashTotalInvoicePax.query: SELECT COUNT(invoice_uuid) as "total", DAYNAME(date) as period FROM cash join cash_item where cash_item.cash_uuid = cash.uuid AND date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND project_id = 2 GROUP BY period;
